pr_title: DHFPROD-5877:Write flow artifact created by 'hubCreateFlow' to db, add better logging

timeline.bodyText: Do we know for sure that the step needs to be modified? I don't think that's true in all cases. Like I can see a custom step working as-is, though of course the user would need to modify the custom step module. I would remove this line of logging.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: For consistency, say "write it to the staging and final databases"
